name: Pranav Dalve
bio: Backend developer who loves clean code, solving real problems, and learning fast.

projects.title: Component Equivalency Finder Web Application
projects.description: A web app to find electronic part equivalents for sourcing.
points: Built a Node.js-based web app to match manufacturer codes with in-house equivalents.
Integrated third-party APIs for real-time component data.
Implemented full CRUD and file export features for reporting.
Used Python, Node.js, JavaScript, and MongoDB for backend development.

projects.title: Comprehensive Fitness Club Management System
projects.description: Web app to manage gym memberships and plans.
points: Developed RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express for diet/fitness plans.
Managed MongoDB database for user and plan storage.
Integrated backend with React frontend via APIs.

projects.title: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Java and SQL-based system for hospital records.
points: Designed Java-based frontend for tracking beds and medicines.
Used SQL for storing and retrieving hospital data.
Connected Java and SQL with JDBC.
